TLSynDataGene package¶

Submodules¶

TLSynDataGene.Generator module¶

Generator¶

This file contains the classes to generate clusters of points as well as full datasets, as well as functions to apply changes in dataset generators, in order to simulate the transition between a source to a target dataset

class TLSynDataGene.Generator.Cluster(weight, dimensionality, min_gauss_dim, max_gauss_dim, min_coordinate, max_coordinate, min_gauss_dim_var, max_gauss_dim_var, class_label)[source]¶

Bases: object

Return type:pandas.DataFrame
generate_stream()[source]¶

Generate the dataset by yielding data objects one after the other. This function is suitable for very large datasets

Returns:new data point coordinates int: new data point class label
Return type:numpy.array
